metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38860 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Certain The MPlayer Project products are vulnerable to Divide By Zero via function demux_open_avi() of libmpdemux/demux_avi.c which affects mencoder. This affects mplayer SVN-r38374-13.0.1 and mencoder SVN-r38374-13.0.1.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-38860` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mencoder - 2:1.3.0-7ubuntu0.2
mplayer - 2:1.3.0-7ubuntu0.2
mplayer-gui - 2:1.3.0-7ubuntu0.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mplayer package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2:1.3.0-7ubuntu0.2').
